description:
Manages a RuntimeConfig resource in Google Cloud. For more information, see the
[official documentation](https://cloud.google.com/deployment-manager/runtime-configurator/),
or the
[JSON API](https://cloud.google.com/deployment-manager/runtime-configurator/reference/rest/).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

Description.description:
The description to associate with the runtime
config.

Name.description: The name of the runtime config.

Project.description:
The ID of the project in which the resource belongs. If it
is not provided, the provider project is used.
